meanings.definition: To make a mistake in playing a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: She kept misplaying the ball during the soccer match.
meanings.sent2: He was misplaying his moves in the chess game.
meanings.sent3: While misplaying, he accidentally scored a goal for the other team.
meanings.sent4: Her misplaying was like a broken record, repeating the same errors.
meanings.sent5: The coach reminded the team to focus and avoid misplaying during the game.

meanings.definition: To perform poorly or incorrectly in a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: The player was misplaying every shot in the basketball game.
meanings.sent2: They were misplaying their passes in the volleyball match.
meanings.sent3: Despite misplaying, they managed to have fun and laugh it off.
meanings.sent4: His misplaying was a stumbling block in their path to victory.
meanings.sent5: The team's coach worked on correcting their misplaying to improve their performance.
